Hero-Section.name: Hussein,
Hero-Section.aboutme: Tech enthusiast who loves to create appealing web apps.

About-Section.title: About
About-Section.discreption: I've always been a tech enthusiast, fascinated by the amazing world of technology. I enjoyed tweaking my computer and smartphone, adding mods to them. Then, I decided to enter the programming world to create things that others could see and be amazed by. Since I like people to see my work, I leaned more towards frontend development. I've been enjoying working with all its languages and technologies

Projects-Section.project1: great app created with react and tailwindCSS for styling and amazing user-interface.
Projects-Section.project2: Great Ebook store created with react and tailwindCSs and mongodb for database and other amazing tools.
Projects-Section.project3: i document app created using reactjs for frontend and socket.io and mongodb for backend for an sync document editing in real time
Projects-Section.project4: weather app created using react and tailwindcss that gives real time weather informations with other info.
Projects-Section.project5: an budget manager created with react for frontend and tailwindCSS for styling.
Projects-Section.project6: Google search engie clone created using nextjs for frentend and api route for backend and tailwind for styling beautifull user interface inspiered by google search

Contact-Section.title: Let's Connect
Contact-Section.content: Let's connect and bring you ideas to life! whether you have a project in mind, want to discuss collaboration, or simply have a question.
